Room.Name: Eidenhoft Boulevard
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Eidenhoft Boulevard, running northeast to southwest.
Room.LongDescription: Eidenhoft Boulevard is easy to remember because it is one of the few roads in Oceancrest which run diagonally. Heading southwest, Eidenhoft heads towards the Oceancrest Memorial Fountain and other unique monuments dedicated towards the heroes of the realm. Further to the northeast, Eidenhoft begins to straighten out and head due north past the Oceancrest Central Arena.
